metadata.name: Flatworld
metadata.description: Mod inspired by the videogame [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1296540/Flatworld/]Flatworld[/url] [h1]What's included?[/h1] [list] [*]2 new characters: Aki and Hikari [*]4 new items inspired in Flatworld [*]1 new trinket [/list] [h2]Items[/h2] [table] [tr] [th]Name[/th] [th]Description[/th] [/tr] [tr] [td]Heat magic[/td] [td]Burn enemies around![/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]1 vs 1[/td] [td]Lock yourself with only one enemy[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]Hikaris's crozier[/td] [td]Push away enemies with the power of wind[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]Matcha tea[/td] [td]It give you power[/td] [/tr] [/table] [h2]Trinkets[/h2] [table] [tr] [th]Name[/th] [th]Description[/th] [/tr] [tr] [td]Alga majo[/td] [td]It gives you more energy to move faster[/td] [/tr] [/table]
